pageProduct.name: Swisse Magnesium + Hydration Powder - Lemon Lime 180g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Magnesium + Hydration Powder Lemon Lime is a premium quality, slightly hypotonic formula that provides a two-fold approach to maintaining muscle health, before or during physical activity. The combination of carbohydrates and electrolytes helps to restore fluid balance in the body, while magnesium helps to relieve muscle cramps and mild muscle spasms when dietary intake is inadequate.

Electrolyte Formula: Carbohydrate-electrolyte solutions are more effective when compared with water at helping to restore fluid balance in the body in physically active people.

Slightly Hypotonic: Scientifically formulated slightly hypotonic compound of magnesium, sodium, potassium and glucose. Slightly hypotonic solutions are emptied rapidly from the stomach compared with high glucose solutions.

Relieves Muscle Cramps & Mild Spasms: Magnesium helps relieve muscle cramps and mild muscle spasms when dietary intake is inadequate.

Naturally Sweetened: Sweetened with naturally derived monk fruit and stevia.

Size: 180g

Warnings

For long term use, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH DOSAGE (10 g) CONTAINS:

MAGNESIUM (from magnesium citrate nonahydrate) 105 mg
POTASSIUM (from potassium citrate) 195 mg
SODIUM (from sodium chloride) 375 mg
GLUCOSE 6 g
ALLERGEN INFORMATION

Contains sugars & sulfites.
Contains glucose.
No added lactose, gluten, yeast, egg, soy, artificial flavours or colours

Directions

Before or during times of physical activity, mix 1.5 level scoops (10 g) with 300 mL of water. Consume once daily or as directed by a healthcare professional. Once dissolved, consume immediately. Some settling of the powder may occur after mixing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Powder may settle prior to opening. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
